components.name: Backend Service
components.description: The core processing unit that handles requests, executes workflows, and integrates with various APIs for data retrieval and processing.

components.name: Web UI
components.description: A dynamic interface that allows users to interact with the backend service, visualize data, and manage configurations.

components.name: Search Engine Integration
components.description: A module that connects to various search APIs (e.g., Tavily) to fetch data for research tasks.

components.name: Configuration Management
components.description: Handles loading and managing configuration settings for the application, including API keys and model parameters.

data_flows.description: User inputs and requests are sent from the Web UI to the Backend Service for processing.
The Backend Service queries the Search Engine Integration to retrieve data based on user requests.
The Backend Service accesses configuration settings to ensure proper execution of workflows.

trust_boundaries.name: User Interaction Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user interface and the backend service, where user inputs are processed.

trust_boundaries.name: External API Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the application and external search APIs, where data is fetched from third-party services.
